name: player50
description: A web interface for viewing CS50 videos.

scripts.init: rm -rf public && mkdir public && cp src/index.html public/index.html
scripts.build: npm run init && npm run bundle
scripts.dev: npm run build && parallelshell 'npm run watch' 'npm run sync'
scripts.bundle: browserify -t babelify src/index.js -o public/index.js -p [ parcelify -o public/index.css -t sass-css-stream -d ./src ]
scripts.watch: watchify -t babelify src/index.js -o public/index.js -p [ parcelify -wo public/index.css -t sass-css-stream -d ./src ]
scripts.release: npm run build && uglifyjs public/index.js -o public/index.js && echo $(uglifycss public/index.css) > public/index.css
